Title: Relates to the administration of the statewide central register of child abuse
Summary: Relates to the administration of the statewide central register of child abuse; requires callers making reports of suspected child abuse or maltreatment to provide their name and contact information.
LawCode: Amd ยง422, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the administration of the statewide central register of child abuse and maltreatment
